thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 47 of 227
thread.title: Meredith

author: Meredith
title: Meredith
text: From start to finish I had a great experience with Gardner-White. The saleswoman was friendly and very helpful in selecting my mattress and worked to get me the best deals and promotions. Delivery was prompt and quick. My only complaint was that they forgot to put my bed frame on the truck and had to come back the next day. Overall, a great experience and will recommend to friends and family!
